Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: copy prisma CLI package to Docker runner stage

The prisma.config.ts file requires the ''prisma/config'' module which is
part of the Prisma CLI package, not @prisma/client. This package was
missing from the runner stage, causing "Cannot find module 'prisma/config'"
errors when running migrations.

Added COPY instruction to include node_modules/prisma in the runner stage
so that prisma migrate deploy can successfully load the config file.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
